column4: Germany needs incentives for electric vehicles  says Economy Minister
column5: BERLIN Germany needs incentives to promote sales of electric vehicles  Economy Minister Sigmar Gabriel said on Thursday after meeting the head of U.S. electric car pioneer Tesla Motors Inc.

column4: Germany needs incentives for electric vehicles  says Econ Minister
column5: BERLIN  Sept 24 Germany needs incentives to promote sales of electric vehicles   Economy Minister Sigmar Gabriel said on Thursday after meeting the head of U.S. electric car pioneer Tesla Motors Inc.

column4: BRIEF-Technicolor receives approval to take over CPE Division from Cisco Systems - ACM
column5: * Technicolor is allowed to take over CPE Division from Cisco Systems  ACM decided Wednesday  Source text: http://bit.ly/1MrsxWG Further company coverage:    (Gdynia Newsroom)

column4: Cisco joins flurry of U.S.-China tech partnerships
column5: BEIJING Cisco Systems Inc  said Thursday it would form a joint-venture with Chinese server maker Inspur to sell networking and cloud computing products in China  where the Silicon Valley firm faces political pressure and declining sales.
